original_text: I tell you this: You must always do what is right. You must live in a way that is better than the teachers of God's Law and the Pharisees. You will never come into the kingdom of heaven if you do not do better than them.’
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 이르노니 너희 의가 서기관과 바리새인보다 더 낫지 못하면 결코 천국에 들어가지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: You must always do what is right.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 항상 옳은 것을 해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: You must live in a way
that is better than the teachers of God's Law
You will never come into the kingdom of heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 결코 천국에 들어가지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: if you do not do better than them.
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 너희가 그들보다 더 잘하지 않는다면.
